name: Athens Flooded
description:
This game was created in three weeks as part of an educational game design project focused on art direction. 

What if the sea rose, and covered the streets of Athens? 
Here you are exploring a section of the abandoned Athens, looking for clues as to what happened to the people who used to live there. 

Art Director, Concept artist, 2D artist: Elena 
Programmer, tech artist, 3D artist: Mathias
3D environment artist: Frederik
2D artist, Concept artist: Evin 
3D Character artist: Sabrina
